channel.title: Castle Wars!
channel.description:
If you have ever played Runescape as a member, you should know what Castle Wars is. It has always been my favorite mini-game, and now we have the opportunity to play it in minecraft! Using this plugin.... [url=http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/mech-fun-war-v1-6-de-gaulle-final-minecraft-tdm-ctf-1337.250/]http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/mech-fun-war-v1-6-de-gaulle-final-minecraft-tdm-ctf-1337.250/[/url]
Features: As a player, you get a fast-paced PVP experience in SMP. Join a battle by entering through the warzone lobby. There is one gate per team (team diamond, gold or iron): step in to join that team. Your inventory is saved when you join a battle, and restored when you exit. When you die inside a warzone, you get instantly teleported back to your spawn, and one life is taken from your team's life pool. When that pool runs out, the other teams score a point! Steal the enemy team flag to score for your team. Fight over monuments, control points that, when captured, restore health to your teammates. As a warzone maker, you have total control. Take advantage cool landscape features or existing player-build structures and incorporate them in new warzones. Tons of options: friendly-fire, auto-assign, turn off PVP outside warzones, define respawn loadouts specific to each zone, turn players' heads into team-colored blocks instead of giving them team-colored helmets, and more! All the blocks in a zone are reset at the end of every battle. Players are prevented from entering or leaving a zone - except through the designated warzone lobby - by a magic glass wall. A warhub can be created to link all your zones together.
We can gather a group of members, remake the castle wars area, and wage war! This could also increase the popularity of the server if posted on somewhere like minecraft.net or planetminecraft. Thoughts? Opinions?

item.title: Castle Wars!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:20, topic:423760”]I was on a few days ago…

Mind you there is only an average of 2 people on when I am, which gets boring pretty quick… especially when they don’t talk…

And rey, Tom is an admin to. Though it doesn’t really matter anyways, MITB is the only one with access to the console[/quote]Most people come online around midnight (UK time). So annoying because I want to sleep not stay up playing minecraft until 5am.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:20, topic:423760”]I was on a few days ago…

Mind you there is only an average of 2 people on when I am, which gets boring pretty quick… especially when they don’t talk…[/quote]
I play even when I am by myself, its no different than being in single player? But that is seriously a bad excuse to not be active. I was fairly active for about 2 weeks and seen MITB and Tom at least twice during that time. I can vouch for rey that you are hardly ever online, and if so, generally not for but a minute or two.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:13, topic:423760”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=526416.msg3835667#msg3835667 date=1322879203]

Can’t we just use world edit to create it?

but we can have fun building rey?

Then put us in creative mode. It would take ages to modify the surface otherwise.

i have plenty of diamonds and wood in w1 so were good your just lazy bro

and the MASS amount of stone bricks we’ll require?

gosh your lazier than me bro
[/quote]

I wanna host a server on minecraft, and I’m trying to have a premade map. I can dl flat maps, but they’re all in survival, and I can’t convert it to a .gz so I can use a hex editor to make it creative. It’s quite a bitch.[/quote]
Get the TooManyItems or SinglePlayerCommands mod. I am not sure about after you save but I do you know can change between Survival and Creative modes with both of these.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Wars!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

If you have ever played Runescape as a member, you should know what Castle Wars is. It has always been my favorite mini-game, and now we have the opportunity to play it in minecraft!

Using this plugin…
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/mech-fun-war-v1-6-de-gaulle-final-minecraft-tdm-ctf-1337.250/

Features: 
As a player, you get a fast-paced PVP experience in SMP.
    Join a battle by entering through the warzone lobby. There is one gate per team (team diamond, gold or iron): step in to join that team.
    Your inventory is saved when you join a battle, and restored when you exit.
    When you die inside a warzone, you get instantly teleported back to your spawn, and one life is taken from your team's life pool. When that pool runs out, the other teams score a point!
    Steal the enemy team flag to score for your team.
    Fight over monuments, control points that, when captured, restore health to your teammates.
As a warzone maker, you have total control.
    Take advantage cool landscape features or existing player-build structures and incorporate them in new warzones.
    Tons of options: friendly-fire, auto-assign, turn off PVP outside warzones, define respawn loadouts specific to each zone, turn players' heads into team-colored blocks instead of giving them team-colored helmets, and more!
All the blocks in a zone are reset at the end of every battle.
Players are prevented from entering or leaving a zone - except through the designated warzone lobby - by a magic glass wall.
A warhub can be created to link all your zones together.</blockquote>

We can gather a group of members, remake the castle wars area, and wage war! This could also increase the popularity of the server if posted on somewhere like minecraft.net or planetminecraft.

Thoughts? Opinions?
